forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.
